item.title: [Python] Story that tried Sourcetrail × macOS × VS Code
item.description: ## Introduction I will try it immediately because the code visualization tool called Sourcetrail has been made open source. It looks interesting. What is Source Trail @ IT’s article (Sourcetrail, a code visualization tool for C++ and Python is open source) Sourcetrail combines features such as interactive dependency graphs, concise code views, and efficient code searching to provide source code overviews and details. By statically analyzing the source code and visualizing it, developers are freed from reading a huge amount of existing source code.
